document_data.name: ''Winged Helm''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Winged helms''''' were [[enchanted]] [[helmet]]s that made its wearer fleet of foot in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: These helms boosted the wearer's speed and subtly improved their intelligence.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, ''winged helms'' could be found among bandits and heroes of the [[Sword Mountains]], in the city of [[Neverwinter]], the cultists of a [[beholder]] [[eye of flame]] who laired in [[the Crags]], and in the hands of the [[vampire lord]] [[Ozit]] from the ruins of [[Illefarn]].
